person.persName: John Cripps Wickliffe (Nelson County attorney and soldier)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Nelson County native. Son of Charles A. Wickliffe and Margaret Cripps. Attended Centre College in Danville, Kentucky. Married to Eleanor Wickliffe on November 2, 1853. Father of John C. Wickliffe, Charles A. Wickliffe, Mary Wickliffe, Margaret Wickliffe, and Ellenor Wickliffe. Admitted to the bar in 1853. Attorney in Nelson County. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1857 to 1859. Secretary of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1859. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as captain from October 2, 1861, to May 1862; major from May 1862 to April 22, 1863; and lieutenant colonel from April 22, 1863.
